msbt.message: Yo, ! I'm really digging this spot you found for me. Thanks!I hope we can keep looking out for each other like this. It's good to have buddies, !
Yo, ! That spot you found for me is just incredible. Thanks!I hope we can keep looking out for each other like this. It's good to have buddies, !
Yo! I'm pumped about that spot you helped me pick out for my tent. Thanks for the push! I hope we can keep looking out for each other like this. It's good to have buddies, !
Oh, right! I've got something here for you, . Thanks again for finding a place for myplace!

That is perfect for !You can try it on by pressing  to open up your pockets. Then press  to select the item you want. Choose "Wear" if you wanna put it on. You can always change later if you need to work out, .
That's right! I got a little thank-you gift for when you spotted me the other day, .Oh. Except it looks like your pockets are full. No prob! I'll just jog by later and drop it in your mailbox.
Hey, isn't that the hat I gave you? Looks great! Really shows off your head-muscle, !
